author: rdonkin
msg: Alfonso noticed that every key for a DynaBean mapped property must be type String - something I missed when I added this functionality originally (Doh!). Removing this introduced an imcompatibility in the nightlies but this is better off being removed before it's released. Patch submitted by Alfonso da Silva.
